snippet: Stocks rose for a fourth consecutive day after the government said employers added more jobs than expected in February.
abstract: Stocks rise modestly on fourth consecutive day of gains, after strong employment report.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose for a fourth consecutive day after the government said employers added more jobs than expected in February.

headline.main: Jobs Data Helps Market Add to a Winning Streak
headline.print_headline: Brisk Job Creation Nudges Stocks Higher
